descriptionHtml:
Hemi is a follower who is skilled in dual wielding. 

You need ApachiSkyHair mod.

You can find her in Whiterun in the Bannered Mare.

Best way to make sure she is in Bannered Mare in Whiterun is to go there, save game, then download mod.

Please Post your screenshots of her in the image section.

Mods used in screen shots but not required,
Eyes of Beauty
Betterfemales by Bella
Cbbe curvy

If she is not in Bannered Mare she might be doing chores. Open console and type \" help Hemi\", it will give you an NPC item number. Then type \" player.placeatme {item number here] dont type in item number here just the number :) example player.placeatme 2010010 . the number i used may be different than yours.
author: Rappinhvac
